## üîÑ Deferred to Next Release

### 1. Header Menu Configuration
**Issue:** Menu exists in admin but not assigned to display location  
**Reason:** Theme location assignment unclear, needed more exploration time  
**Impact:** Menu not visible on website header  
**Next Steps:** Configure menu display location in v3.0.0

### 2. WP User Manager Detailed Settings
**Reason:** Settings interface complex, deferred to avoid errors  
**Current State:** Plugin installed with default settings  
**Next Steps:** Configure email verification, registration flow, redirect behavior in v3.0.0

### 3. Login Redirect Configuration
**Decision:** Defer until role-based smart routing implementation  
**Current Behavior:** All users redirect to `/account/` after login  
**Future Enhancement:** Role-based redirect (Employer‚Üí/employers/, Candidate‚Üí/candidates/, etc.)  
**Timeline:** v3.0.0 with Employers page (WP-01.2)

### 4. Help Page Deployment
**Status:** Exists in local dev, not deployed to production  
**Reason:** Focus on core authentication functionality first  
**Next Steps:** Deploy Help page in v3.0.0

### 5. Additional Test Users
**Created in production:** employer_test, candidate_test (2 of 4)  
**Not created:** scout_test, operator_test  
**Next Steps:** Create remaining test users when testing Scout/Operator features

### 6. Page Sync
**Not synced to local:**
- Privacy Policy page (exists in production only)

**Not synced to production:**
- About us page
- Help page

**Decision:** Sync pages properly when building WP-01.5 (Privacy Policy) and deploying Help page

## üêõ Known Issues

### 1. Header Menu Not Visible
**Symptom:** Menu created in admin but doesn't appear in website header  
**Cause:** Menu location not assigned to theme display location  
**Workaround:** None - will fix in next release  
**Resolution:** Assign menu to correct Blocksy theme location

### 2. Logout Redirects to WordPress Default
**Symptom:** Logout link goes to `wp-login.php` instead of `/log-in/`  
**Cause:** Login/Logout Menu plugin default redirect behavior  
**Impact:** Minor UX inconsistency  
**Resolution:** Configure plugin redirect settings (deferred)

### 3. No Role-Based Redirect After Login
**Symptom:** All users land on `/account/` regardless of role  
**Expected Behavior:** Employers‚Üí/employers/, Candidates‚Üí/candidates/, etc.  
**Status:** By design - smart routing deferred to Phase 2  
**Resolution:** Implement custom role-based redirect logic in v3.0.0

---

## üìù Lessons Learned

### What Went Well
1. **Elementor template export/import** - efficient way to deploy button changes
2. **WP User Manager auto-page creation** - saved manual work
3. **Test user creation** - caught login flow issues early
4. **Git auto-deploy** - Hostinger integration worked smoothly

### What Could Improve
1. **Menu configuration** - need better theme location documentation
2. **Time estimation** - underestimated complexity of menu/plugin config
3. **Page sync strategy** - needed upfront clarification
4. **Plugin availability** - Login/Logout Menu not in Hostinger marketplace (manual upload workaround)

### Process Improvements
1. **Pre-deployment:** Test menu location assignment on staging first
2. **Documentation:** Add screenshots for theme-specific menu configuration
3. **Scope management:** Better at deferring non-critical items upfront
4. **Plugin research:** Check Hostinger marketplace availability before planning

---
